overview: Ivo Rombouts is the personal driver of Frederik Bulinckx, CEO of a petrochemical multinational. Frederik looses himself in alcohol and women. His greed for money drives him straight into the arms of Russians who want to take over the company. Ivo tries to pull Frederik out of his downward spiral, but has his own personal problems to deal with...
tagline: A good driver hears and sees everything, but above all knows how to keep quiet...
title: The Barrier of Silence
